content.html: I regret to inform you that Labour are also going all in against VPNs, because (as they say) 16 year olds will use them to bypass the Bill's UK-wide age verification walls. I'm just the live tweeter here folks. #OnlineSafetyBill
content.value:
I regret to inform you that Labour are also going all in against VPNs, because (as they say) 16 year olds will use them to bypass the Bill's UK-wide age verification walls.

I'm just the live tweeter here folks.

#OnlineSafetyBill
